<title level="1" right="Rules">[Maximum Duration](/Rules.aspx?ID=2394)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 430 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If an affliction lasts only a limited amount of time, it lists a maximum duration. Once this duration passes, the affliction ends. Otherwise, it lasts until you succeed at enough saves to recover, as described in [Stages](/Rules.aspx?ID=2395) below.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
